mapper.select: SELECT sub_name, sub_type, sub_semester, sub_year, sub_info FROM subject_tb where sub_id = #{sub_id};

select sub_tb.sub_year, sub_tb.sub_semester, sub_tb.sub_name, sub_tb.sub_type, subDe_tb.sub_detail_type, subDe_tb.sub_detail_exam, subDe_tb.sub_detail_project, subDe_tb.sub_detail_substitute from subject_detail_tb as subDe_tb join subject_tb as sub_tb on subDe_tb.sub_id = sub_tb.sub_id

select sub_tb.sub_year, sub_tb.sub_semester, sub_tb.sub_name, sub_tb.sub_type, subDe_tb.sub_detail_type, subDe_tb.sub_detail_exam, subDe_tb.sub_detail_project, subDe_tb.sub_detail_substitute from subject_detail_tb as subDe_tb join subject_tb as sub_tb on subDe_tb.sub_id = sub_tb.sub_id where sub_tb.sub_name like concat('%', #{searchString}, '%')
